Summary As an IT Service Delivery Professional, I excel at managing resources effectively, and in achieving high levels of customer satisfaction in service delivery.  
 
Throughout my career, I have been known as a dedicated team lead with excellent technical, organizational, and interpersonal communication skills. I am skilled at managing multiple, large scale global projects, meeting contract requirements, budgets and schedules.  
 
I am known for identifying and implementing new processes and best practices that drive positive results. I review, analyze, and improve or leverage existing processes and best practices. I have significant expertise in managing IT projects and resources and acting as a liaison between IT Delivery and clients. 
 
 
Some of my core competencies include: 
 
· Team Leadership 
· Project Management 
· Data Security 
· Regulatory & Internal Policy Compliance 
· Issue Resolution 
· Change Management 
· Data Availability  
 
I can be reached through LinkedIn or at sedelmev@gmail.com. 
 
My technical skills include:  
 
· Unix OS (Solaris, AIX, Linux / Red Hat) 
· Virtualization 
· HACMP  
· Windows OS 
· Tivoli Products

· Distributed File Systems (AFS DFS, GSA) Experience Advisory Project Manager / Service Delivery Manager IBM July 2010  – Present (5 years 2 months) In my role as Advisory Project Manager / Service Delivery Manager of a distributed environment for a leading commercial institution (Avis), I managed an account consisting of 600+ Unix / Windows servers in multiple global delivery centers supporting OS, Database, Middleware, Storage, Messaging, Tools, and other applications.  
 
I also managed all delivery work associated with the Avis account (including projects, security compliance, change/problem management and new/RFS work), completing projects and implementing efficiencies in delivery, inventory, monitoring, currency, security, problem resolution, and change management. 
 
A few accomplishments I am proud of are: 
 
· Managed over 40 new customer RFS(Request For Services) including 80 new servers representing 8% growth from previous year supporting customers’ strategic initiatives. 
 
· Managed process improvement project implementing efficiencies in monitoring and automation, delivering significantly improved quality and average cost reductions in labor of about 25%. Team Lead / Technical Team Lead IBM June 2008  –  July 2010  (2 years 2 months) As the Team Lead, I provided technical guidance, account leadership and direction to support teams on projects and delivery issues. I managed 200+ servers across 20 different IBM Internal accounts and all account work including the planning and staffing of new projects, problems related to delivery, coordinating coverage and skills required for projects. 
 
Something I am proud of: 
 
· Coordinated directly with account executives, delivery managers, and program managers, addressing new business requests, projects, financial interlock and regarding problem / change control.  Technical Services Professional / Technical Project Manager IBM January 2007  –  June 2008  (1 year 6 months) As the Technical Project Manager, I managed projects and provided technical and strategic guidance to delivery teams.  
 
Here, I am proud of: 
 
· Managed Software group server consolidation project including complete hardware / software upgrade from SP frame architecture to P-series, successfully setting-up and migrating servers, applications, thousands of users, and terabytes of data 2 months ahead of schedule.  Technical Services Professional IBM 2005  –  2007  (2 years) In my role as the Technical Services Professional, I was the department and technical team lead.
